datasheets.name: Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan
datasheets.leader: This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Retributor Squad
composition: 1 Aestred Thurga – Epic Hero 1 Agathae Dolan – Epic Hero

other.name: Auto-Tapestry of the Emperor’s Judgement
other.description: While Aestred Thurga is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

other.name: Recount the Deeds of the Saints
other.description: While Agathae Dolan is part of this unit, each time this unit performs an Act of Faith, the result of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first improved by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

other.name: Extremis Trigger Word
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can choose to invoke its extremis trigger word. If you do, then until the end of the phase, arco-flails equipped by models in this unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

datasheets.name: Battle Sisters Squad
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

wargear.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
wargear.description: Each time a unit is destroyed by the bearer’s unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

other.name: Cherub
other.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

other.name: Defenders of the Faith
other.description: At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

datasheets.name: Canoness
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants

wargear.name: Null Rod
wargear.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

wargear.name: Rod of Office
wargear.description: Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

other.name: Lead the Righteous
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

other.name: The Emperor’s Grace
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save.

other.name: Rites of Castigation
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its Castigator autocannons that targets an enemy Infantry unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll. Each time this model makes an attack with its Castigator battle cannon that targets an enemy Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll. After this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by its Castigator autocannons or Castigator battle cannon this phase. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.name: Sworn Protectors
other.description: While a Canoness, Palatine or Junith Eruita model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

other.name: Spiritual Fortitude
other.description: While a Missionary or Preacher model is leading this unit, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Daemonifuge
composition: 1 Ephrael Stern – Epic Hero 1 Kyganil of the Bloody Tears – Epic Hero

other.name: Holy Judgement
other.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to Ephrael Stern. That unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 2 from the result if it is a Chaos unit. If the test is failed, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

other.name: Mysterious Saviours
other.description: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

other.name: Death Cult
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Character unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

datasheets.name: Dialogus
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Retributor Squad ■ Sisters Novitiate Squad This model can be attached to a Battle Sisters Squad, even if one Canoness, Palatine or Junith Eruita model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

other.name: Laud Hailer
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can be selected as the target of Stratagems even when it is Battle-shocked.

other.name: Stirring Rhetoric
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time this model’s unit performs an Act of Faith, the result of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first changed to a 6.

datasheets.name: Dogmata
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Retributor Squad This model can be attached to a Battle Sisters Squad, even if one Canoness, Palatine or Junith Eruita model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

other.name: Executioner of Heretics (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that unit, subtract 1 from the test.

other.name: Unflinching Determination
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

datasheets.name: Dominion Squad
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

wargear.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
wargear.description: Each time a unit is destroyed by the bearer’s unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

other.name: Cherub
other.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

other.name: Holy Vanguard
other.description: You can re-roll Advance rolls made for this unit.

other.name: Mobile Shrine (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Adepta Sororitas Infantry unit is within 6" of this model, improve the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Hospitaller
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Retributor Squad ■ Sisters Novitiate Squad This model can be attached to a Battle Sisters Squad, even if one Canoness, Palatine or Junith Eruita model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

other.name: Medicus Ministorum
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

other.name: Sacred Healing
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one friendly Adepta Sororitas Infantry Character unit within 3" of this model. That unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. A unit can only be affected by this ability once per turn.

datasheets.name: Imagifier
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Retributor Squad This model can be attached to a Battle Sisters Squad, even if one Canoness, Palatine or Junith Eruita model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

other.name: Litany of Deeds
other.description: Each time you gain a Miracle dice as the result of a friendly Adepta Sororitas unit being destroyed, if that unit was destroyed within 12" of this model, you can re-roll the result of that Miracle dice before adding it to your Miracle dice pool.

other.name: Stanchion of Holy Martyrs
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save. While this model is leading a Celestian Sacresants unit, models in that unit have a Save characteristic of 2+.

datasheets.name: Immolator
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 6 Adepta Sororitas Infantry models. It cannot transport Jump Pack models or the Triumph of Saint Katherine. At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, you can select one Battle Sisters Squad, Dominion Squad or Sisters Novitiate Squad from your army. If you do, that unit is split into two units, each containing as equal a number of models as possible (when splitting a unit in this way, make a note of which models form each of the two new units). One of these units must start the battle embarked within this Transport; the other can start the battle embarked within another Transport, or it can be deployed as a separate unit.

other.name: Fire Support
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

datasheets.name: Junith Eruita
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants

other.name: The Pulpit of Saint Holline’s Basilica
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.name: Fiery Conviction
other.description: If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your Command phase, you gain 1CP.

datasheets.name: Missionary
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Arco-flagellants ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Crusaders ■ Sisters Novitiate Squad

other.name: War Hymn
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

other.name: Holy Piety
other.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack, unless this model’s unit is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

wargear.name: Anchorite Sarcophagus
wargear.description: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 3+.

other.name: Anguish of the Unredeemed
other.description: Each time this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

datasheets.name: Morvenn Vahl
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Paragon Warsuits SUPREME COMMANDER If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

other.name: Abbess Sanctorum
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

other.name: Righteous Repugnance
other.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of your next Command phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of Fidelis and the Lance of Illumination.

special.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
special.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

datasheets.name: Palatine
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sisters Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants ■ Dominion Squad ■ Sisters Novitiate Squad

other.name: Fury of the Righteous
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

other.name: Rapturous Blows
other.description: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can discard one Miracle dice. If you do, then until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack made by this model scores a wound, the target of that attack suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.

other.name: Righteous Paragons
other.description: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

other.name: Endless Suffering
other.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

datasheets.name: Preacher
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Arco-flagellants ■ Crusaders ■ Sisters Novitiate Squad

other.name: Righteous Smiting
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

other.name: Zealot
other.description: Once per battle, in the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by this model by 2.

other.name: Overseer of Redemption
other.description: While this unit contains a Repentia Superior, each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, you can also re-roll the Wound roll.

datasheets.name: Retributor Squad
datasheets.loadout: The Retributor Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon. Each Retributor is equipped with: bolt pistol; heavy bolter; close combat weapon.

other.name: Cherubs
other.description: Twice per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place two Cherub tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used.

other.name: Storm of Retribution
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

datasheets.name: Saint Celestine
datasheets.leader: This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ Seraphim Squad ■ Zephyrim Squad

other.name: Healing Tears
other.description: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase, if this unit is below its Starting Strength, 1 destroyed model is returned to this unit.

other.name: Lifewards
other.description: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

other.name: Miraculous Intervention
other.description: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

other.name: Angelic Ascent
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

datasheets.name: Sisters Novitiate Squad
datasheets.loadout: The Novitiate Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon. Each Sister Novitiate is equipped with: autopistol; autogun; close combat weapon.

wargear.name: Sacred Banner
wargear.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
wargear.description: Each time a unit is destroyed by the bearer’s unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

other.name: Impetuous Fervour
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

datasheets.name: Sororitas Rhino
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Adepta Sororitas Infantry models. It cannot transport Jump Pack models or the Triumph of Saint Katherine.

other.name: Self Repair
other.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

datasheets.name: Triumph Of Saint Katherine
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Battle Sisters Squad
composition: 1 Triumph of Saint Katherine – Epic Hero

other.name: Relics of the Matriarchs
other.description: At the start of the battle round, select up to two of the abilities in the Relics of the Matriarchs section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has those abilities.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, the Attacks characteristics of all of its weapons are halved, and you can only select one ability when using its Relics of the Matriarchs ability, instead of up to two.

profiles.name: is destroyed, the Miracle dice you gain as a result is
Censer of the Sacred Rose (Aura): While a friendly
Adepta Sororitas unit is within 6" of this model,
improve that unit’s Leadership characteristic by 1.
Simulacrum of the Ebon Chalice (Aura): While a
friendly Adepta Sororitas unit is within 6" of this
model, that unit can perform any number of Acts of
Faith per phase, instead of only one.

wargear.name: Sacred Banner
wargear.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Embodied Prophecy
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.
